name: Random Chat
description:
Based on the weekly Naver Webtoon 'Random Chat,' this visual novel breathes new life into the story by re-forming it into a dating simulation game!

A game three years in the making, brought to you by Story Director ZAD and Art Director kero, the team behind 'Some Some Convenience Store' and 'Miracle Snack Shop'!

Experience something completely new as the story flows away from the source material. Romance 4 girls with 4 totally different personalities in this fully-voiced dating sim.

Set to release in the first quarter of 2023


- A work based on the Naver Webtoon 'Random Chat'

Date the charming girls from the original webtoon series
Enjoy this love simulation game, even with no knowledge of the original series.
Experience all sorts of new story arcs that weren't featured in the webtoon.



- An expanded story featuring four heroines

Progress down one of four routes, one for each of our different heroines, for even greater enjoyment and satisfaction.
In addition to our four heroines, the diverse cast of supporting characters were all dubbed by professional voice actors and actresses to immerse you in this fully-voiced drama.


- Dive into the world of 'Random Chat' and experience it all firsthand

Run through the school and side streets that serve as the backdrop of the story.
It's not only the world that you can delve into, as you can experience school life through side stories that play out on social media and messenger apps.
Enjoy the simulation and gaming aspects that will only add to the story.


*. This game is an 18+ rating, but it would be because of the vulgar language, not for overt sexual displays.
